name: Overthrowing the Network State with Coordi-Nations
description:
EMPIRICAL

9:30 - 11:00 - Reporting from the Working Groups:: Comparative analysis of successful and unsuccessful attempts at creating post-Westphalian communities

11:00 - 12:30: Fishbowl: Insights and lessons learned from empirical studies. How not to replicate the same mistakes?

14:00 - 17:00 Roundtable discussions: 

  1. The role of the commons in transitions historically, and evolution of States  (Michel Bauwens).
  2. Ostrom and communing in relation to unions, coops, faith, social enterprise, DAOs and mutualism (Sara H.)
